attributes.action: Stop the sale of the student loan book and offset the debt as part of the 10p tax review.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Graduates who are not yet earning sufficient pay to afford to start repaying the student loan should now be considered for an offset of the loan debt against the loss of the 10% tax band.  Young people who have studied for 3 or 4 years are already finding it difficult to get on the housing ladder or even repay their loans.  Why not help them out?
